#ifndef _GV_DICT_
#define _GV_DICT_

#include <gvbasic.h>
#include <gvstring.h>
#include <gvplist.h>

class GvDictEntry {
  private:
    u_long              key;
    void *              value;
    GvDictEntry *       next;
    GvDictEntry(u_long k, void *v)      { key = k; value = v; };

friend class GvDict;
};

class GvDict {
  public:
    GvDict( int entries = 251 );
    ~GvDict();
    void        clear();
    GvBool      enter(u_long key, void *value);
    GvBool      find(u_long key, void *&value) const;
    GvBool      remove(u_long key);

  private:
    int                 tableSize;
    GvDictEntry *       *buckets;
    GvDictEntry *&      findEntry(u_long key) const;
};

#endif /* _GV_DICT_ */
